desc: Challenging trivia questions about the company OpenAI, its history, products, and influence.

questions.prompt: In which year was OpenAI founded?
Who was not one of the original founders of OpenAI: elon musk, sam altman, bill gates, or greg brockman?
What is the name of OpenAI’s language model that reached widespread recognition in 2020 for generating human-like text?
OpenAI initially started as a [nonprofit], [for-profit], or [government agency] organization?
Which major technology company announced a multibillion-dollar investment in OpenAI in 2019?
OpenAI created an AI capable of playing complex video games, including the classic game Dota 2. True or false?
What does the acronym ‘GPT’ in OpenAI’s models stand for?
In 2021, OpenAI released a multimodal AI called DALL·E that generates images from text. Is this statement correct?
OpenAI’s research and technology primarily focus on artificial intelligence in which domain?
As of mid-2025, OpenAI operates with a capped-profit structure, combining goals of profit and public benefit. Yes or no?
